42c027e4ff9730fbb3de84c1af0d2c506e41c3e4:
Daniel Radcliffe turns 18, gains access to £20 million fortune
Young actor insists he won't be extravagant with his money
Radcliffe's earnings from first five Potter films held in trust fund
Life beyond Potter includes TV movie "My Boy Jack" and Australian film "December Boys"
ee8871b15c50d0db17b0179a6d2beab35065f1e9:
- Miami-Dade pretrial detention facility's ninth floor houses inmates with severe mental illnesses.
- Judge Steven Leifman advocates for justice and the mentally ill, stating that the system is overwhelmed.
- Starting in 2008, some inmates will be sent to a mental health facility instead of the "forgotten floor" for long-term treatment.
06352019a19ae31e527f37f7571c6dd7f0c5da37:
- Minneapolis bridge collapses, causing vehicles to fall into the Mississippi River.
- Survivor Gary Babineau recounts his experience and helps rescue children from a school bus.
- Emergency responders and volunteers work quickly to get 55 people into ambulances within two hours.
24521a2abb2e1f5e34e6824e0f9e56904a2b0e88:
Doctors removed five small polyps from President Bush's colon, none appeared worrisome.
Polyps were sent to National Naval Medical Center for routine microscopic examination.
Bush is in good humor and will resume his activities at Camp David.
Vice President Dick Cheney assumed presidential power during the procedure.
7fe70cc8b12fab2d0a258fababf7d9c6b5e1262a:
NFL suspends Falcons quarterback Michael Vick indefinitely without pay. 
Vick admits to participating in a dogfighting ring as part of a plea agreement.
Vick and co-conspirators killed dogs that did not fight well, court papers reveal.
a1ebb8bb4d370a1fdf28769206d572be60642d70:
Youssif, a 5-year-old Iraqi boy, suffered severe burns after being doused in gasoline and set on fire by masked men.
The Children's Burn Foundation has agreed to pay for Youssif's transportation to the U.S. for treatment and set up a fund for donations.
Dr. Peter Grossman, a plastic surgeon, will donate his services for Youssif's surgeries, which are expected to take six months to a year.
Youssif's family faces challenges in obtaining
7c0e61ac829a3b3b653e2e3e7536cc4881d1f264:
- Iraqi women are turning to prostitution to provide for their families due to the dire economic situation.
- Many of these women are widows or have husbands unable to work, leaving them as the sole breadwinners.
- The Organization for Women's Freedom in Iraq is working to document cases and raise awareness of the issue.
f0d73bdab711763e745cdc75850861c9018f235d:
Key rebel commander and fugitive Tomas Medina Caracas killed in air attack on guerrilla encampment.
Medina Caracas was a member of FARC's high command and managed the group's cocaine trafficking network.
He was indicted by the U.S. in 2002 for drug trafficking and conspiring to kidnap U.S. oil workers.
The Colombian army's Rapid Response Force tracked him down and confirmed his death.
5e22bbfc7232418b8d2dd646b952e404df5bd048:
Tony Snow, White House press secretary, will step down on September 14 due to cancer treatment. 
President Bush "sadly accepts" Snow's resignation and praises his work. 
Deputy press secretary Dana Perino will replace Snow.
613d6311ec2c1985bd44707d1796d275452fe156:
Empty rocket launcher tube found on Jersey City lawn, FBI investigating
Launcher turned over to U.S. Army, deemed inoperable and not a hazard
Joint Terrorism Task Force and police investigating origin and circumstances
017d27d00eb43678c15cb4a8dd4723a035323219:
President Bush will invoke historical lessons of Vietnam to argue against pulling out of Iraq.
He will tell Veterans of Foreign Wars that withdrawal from Vietnam emboldened today's terrorists.
Bush's speeches are part of a series of attempts by the White House to reframe the debate over Iraq.
85f55a3e0dd672857aaaaa80954934a57b7a2fbf:
- June 29, 2007: Police defuse a bomb in an abandoned car in Haymarket, central London.
- July 7, 2005: Four suicide bombers kill 52 people and injure around 700 in London's transport network.
- December 1988: A Pan Am airliner explodes over Lockerbie, Scotland, killing 270 people.
77d7c8cf2a9432e395d629371a12790c563c19f7:
Carlos Alberto joins Werder Bremen for a club record fee of 7.8 million euros.
He previously played for FC Porto under Jose Mourinho, winning the Champions League.
Bundesliga champions VfB Stuttgart also set to sign Ewerthon on loan from Real Zaragoza.
35f0e33de7923036a97ac245d899f990bda5e242:
Vice President Cheney to serve as acting president during Bush's colonoscopy. 
Procedure expected to take 2.5 hours at Camp David, supervised by Dr. Richard Tubb.
Colonoscopy is the most sensitive test for colon and rectal cancer, and polyps.
2ad31cae96512af5105b9b23f9b681dc732b2605:
Magnitude 4.2 earthquake hits San Francisco area
2,000 customers left without power, no injuries reported
Quake centered near Oakland, lasted about 50 seconds
0d43b97000ff852282c89d8d105e41495c0ee9bd:
Federal official declares "no remaining hope" of finding six trapped Utah coal miners alive. 
Rescue efforts have been ongoing for almost a month, with no signs of life detected.
President Bush and Labor Secretary Elaine Chao express sympathy for the failed efforts and the families affected.
bf0cd4ccacd4fe045995338f4c44d9cf18000226:
At least 14 killed, 60 wounded in bomb attack in Batna, Algeria
Bomb exploded 20 meters from mosque, 15 minutes before president's arrival
No immediate claim of responsibility; Algeria faces ongoing Islamic insurgency
2f43e9dfaa43ffbddbce339a8b6403ddce43b38a:
Football superstar David Beckham signs five-year contract with LA Galaxy
Beckham's journey from Manchester United to Hollywood Hills examined
Impact of overseas stars on US soccer and Beckham's influence explored
Growing popularity of soccer among American youth changing perceptions
eb68bc51ed4fc727a1af058192a3fef0916c91e7:
Virus found in Australian honey bees may be linked to collapse of US bee colonies.
Colony collapse disorder has killed up to 90% of colonies in some US beekeeping operations.
Israeli Acute Paralysis Virus (IAPV) identified in healthy Australian bees, but they seem resistant.
Researchers caution that colony collapse disorder is likely caused by several factors.
ad021a7924ee57491cee8576499ac196b1afeb23:
Savers at UK mortgage bank Northern Rock lined up for a second day to empty their accounts.
The Bank of England bailed out the lender after it heavily slashed profit forecasts.
Customers have withdrawn about £1 billion ($2 billion) since the bank's woes were revealed.
9d7fc7fd9ffbfecb1c458b9929fa02e6c3538368:
O.J. Simpson arrested on robbery and assault charges in Las Vegas
Simpson accused of directing armed robbery of sports memorabilia
Police believe Simpson was not carrying a firearm during the incident
30cb674030b01014d2c87b92f09152857e249631:
Nigeria's TV survival show suspended after contestant drowns
Contestant Anthony Ogadje, 25, died during preparation for "Gulder Ultimate Search"
Show sponsored by Heineken's local unit, offers cash prizes and celebrity status to winner
d41dc7fc05273a37f0aceaf4f3e35a187f12653e:
Former government contract employee indicted for stealing restricted nuclear energy-related materials.
Roy Lynn Oakley, 67, appeared in federal court in Knoxville on Thursday.
Oakley is a former employee of Bechtel Jacobs, the Department of Energy's prime environmental management contractor.
The indictment states that Oakley had access to and was entrusted with sections of 'barriers' used for uranium enrichment.
fbc6a4d0697b2a3e8b549dcb1f80a8ce7bf47e34:
Chelsea awaits John Terry's fitness for Champions League match against Valencia. 
Frank Lampard ruled out due to thigh injury. 
Michael Essien expected to play despite leg injury.
0753a471e6908c35bcbc2daa37e21f3a8443b590:
- Paul Lee received a liver transplant from an executed Chinese prisoner
- A shortage of donated organs in rich countries is driving people to poorer nations for transplants
- The World Health Organization estimates that 21,000 liver transplants are carried out annually, but demand is at least 90,000
08450c1bc03472825196be1acb02ac0e13bef939:
Lindsay Lohan's legal troubles raise questions about insuring her future movies. 
No actor is uninsurable, but problematic stars can be covered at a high cost.
Insurance rates for errant actors can range from 1% to 3% of a movie's production budget.
7fa8d9beca50155fd3d71a9087a4311ce321c34b:
Francesco Totti threatens to quit Italian Players Association over Serie A start date row
Totti complains that Italian players are never listened to by the league
The league ignored a request by Italy coach to start the season earlier for Euro 2008 qualifiers preparation
414a5b8ecbe189d2767c75b839775a1dcafaf4d3:
Blackwater USA denies allegations of unlawful arms activities in Iraq.
Federal prosecutors are investigating claims that Blackwater employees illegally purchased and sold weapons in Iraq.
The U.S. attorney's office in Raleigh, North Carolina, is focusing on individual company employees, not the firm itself.
Blackwater is a security firm hired by the State Department to guard U.S. staff in Iraq.
cac7a712935380d74410a7cba8d406235d51249a:
Youssif, a 5-year-old burned Iraqi boy, met his favorite superhero, Spider-Man, at Universal Studios.
The boy's family survived a pretend earthquake at the theme park and enjoyed other attractions.
Youssif's father said the day was the happiest of his life, aside from his wedding day.
e9093ca0a82f2aba28cd2762942c04177cfbb000:
Marine Cpl. Trent D. Thomas convicted for role in Iraqi civilian's death.
Thomas found guilty of kidnapping and conspiracy to commit several offenses.
He will be demoted to entry-level private and receive a bad-conduct discharge.
55a6aabd120f0b18297f7efe22452f9b3aca0d8d:
Prince Harry pays tribute to Princess Diana on the 10th anniversary of her death
Describes her as "the best mother in the world" in a speech at a memorial service
Princess Diana remembered for her public work and impact on landmine victims and AIDS patients
06bc2f0272d033b123e9eebbb221c62d7d51c283: French Foreign Minister Bernard Kouchner warns of possible war with Iran over its nuclear program. Kouchner, a socialist appointed to conservative government, is known for challenging convention. He supports US-led intervention in Iraq and joins Britain in pushing for action in Darfur. Kouchner's warning to Iran aligns with France's new high-profile style under President Sarkozy.
17e43e8e7d2bbbb237df78537d108c3fa917d9fb:
- "Für Elise" was likely written for Therese Malfatti, not Elise.
- "Philadelphia Freedom" was written for Billie Jean King, inspired by her tennis team.
- "Lola" was inspired by either Candy Darling or a drunken night with a transvestite.
ddcdeb9bdd19fa23f9495c85d48eeee910f33102:
Presidential race and willingness of candidates to buy TV time lead to historic spending for political and issue-advocacy advertising.
Cost to influence 2008 election could exceed $3 billion, nearly twice as much as in 2004.
Mitt Romney has spent the most on TV advertising among presidential contenders, with over 11,000 airings at a cost of nearly $8.6 million.
ee0ba7928d8987f2cb21c9a2012a76730f77de45:
Relatives of the 89 people killed in Phuket plane crash arrive to identify remains
Most of those killed were foreign nationals, with 36 bodies still unidentified
Investigation into the cause of the crash continues, bad weather suspected factor
554fd99f28ae12472c5d99ef6383bb184744c25a:
Filmmaker Michael Moore and CNN's Sanjay Gupta argued about Gupta's report on Moore's film "Sicko"
Both agreed on the basic premise of "Sicko": Problems abound in America's health-care system and need to be fixed
Gupta praised Moore for raising awareness of the issue but was concerned that the movie suggests health care in other countries is free
9e141ebc1c06d483bf85f4e5c8b3c7bc2d00ea2f:
Some Democrats wavering on House resolution labeling Turkey's treatment of Armenians in WWI as genocide.
Turkey threatens to block access to Incirlik Air Base, a major resupply center for U.S. operations in Iraq.
Pentagon prepares new supply routes for troops in Iraq if Turkey cuts off access to Incirlik.
c9160e2f5ce386dabb10517e7a5c0933c01a9546:
Mohammed Rasoul, a 12-year-old Iraqi boy who lost his leg in an explosion, is set to travel to the United States for treatment and a prosthetic leg.
The Global Medical Relief Fund, a New York-based charity, arranged for Mohammed's surgery and treatment at the Shriners Children Hospital in Philadelphia.
Mohammed's story caught the attention of the charity after it was broadcast on CNN in May, and the organization's founder, Elissa Montanti, was inspired to help him
d256aee1a47eb5b489dee6fb72ab7f7d1483a37f:
India elects its first female president, Pratibha Patil, in a boost for women's rights.
Patil, 72, easily beat opposition-backed challenger and vice president, Bhairon Singh Shekhawat.
Supporters hope Patil's presidency will bring attention to issues plaguing women in India.
Critics raise concerns over financial irregularities and controversial comments made by Patil.
2fff2bc541ef34a6647dfa2e4294cdcc187e47b9:
Landslide in San Diego community evacuates over 100 homes
Mayor declares state of emergency, seeks aid from California and federal government
Hillside community had been shifting for at least two weeks prior to the landslide
677375a4c69e81ab623af7c06a6b0a8d03d6350e:
Most children French charity tried to take from Chad are not Sudanese orphans, aid agencies say.
Six members of Zoe's Ark arrested for attempting to put children on a plane to France.
Chadian President Idriss Deby hopes journalists and flight crew involved will be freed.
33530f97118cc905b05cb920671492c7bfdf3a3b: Explorer Dennis Schmitt discovered an island near Greenland nearly two years ago. The island was previously thought to be a peninsula attached to Greenland by an ice shelf or glacier. Schmitt calls his discovery Warming Island, as it is an example of climate change and the effects of global warming.
3c19a753303ae0d67b3ae28e070c0f4157ffc52d:
Enraged crowd drags Ethiopian soldier's body through Mogadishu streets
Clashes between Ethiopian troops and Islamic insurgents kill 19 people
Fighting drives hundreds more people from their homes in the capital
9313988d26672c576f08e130c895edf20d8aa626:
Stacy Peterson, 23, missing from her suburban Chicago home since October 28
Husband, police sergeant Drew Peterson, is a suspect in potential homicide
Judge signed order to exhume body of Drew Peterson's third wife, who drowned in 2004
72f4a6670ec7ec915c83d58bb0ebf152b1605bb6:
Julia Vakulenko reaches her first WTA Tour final at the Bell Challenge in Quebec.
She will face former world No. 1 Lindsay Davenport, who is seeking her second win in three tournaments.
Davenport has surged back up the rankings from 234th to 126th after winning her comeback tournament in Bali.
b73f50e29d5b2943eb315643bef8ee4e09f5605b:
- Pakistani President Pervez Musharraf declares state of emergency and suspends constitution
- Opposition leader and acting president of ex-Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif's party arrested
- U.S. Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice says U.S. doesn't support extra-constitutional measures taken by Musharraf
f9689fb9656132e1c6d186851563f2b968643791:
National Children's Museum COO arrested for distributing child pornography
Robert A. Singer accused of sending explicit images to undercover detective
Singer faces up to 140 years in prison if convicted on all counts
63831b842812b1a3d05b04904a10d160fe7ad2af:
Chester Arthur Stiles appears in court on charges related to the videotaped rape of a 2-year-old girl.
Stiles faces 23 felony counts, including lewdness with a minor and sexual assault.
The girl, now 7, was found last month after a nationwide search; her mother says she remembers nothing of the assault.
05688bac0e46542be65a6df240428a6f26c86fd0:
Dale Steyn takes career-best five for 34 in Johannesburg test against New Zealand.
New Zealand bowled out for 118 in reply to South Africa's 226.
South Africa reaches 179 for two in their second innings, stretching lead to 287.
5ba0d22ccba29ac8a3c77da069165d6016f5a214:
1. Cutting jeans into shorts: Mark desired length, fold and iron, then cut evenly.
2. Catch fireflies by imitating their blinking pattern with a pen flashlight.
3. Running on the beach: Start slowly, wear shoes for longer distances, and pick the right time.
4. Tie espadrilles by crossing and tying laces behind the ankle, continuing up the leg, and securing slightly tighter than comfortable.
